-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Aviones"
(
    "IdAviones" integer NOT NULL,
    numero integer,
    modelo text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    peso bigint,
    capacidad integer,
    "IdHangar" integer,
    "IdNumeroLicencia" integer,
    CONSTRAINT "Aviones_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("IdAviones")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Hangares"
(
    "IdHangar" integer NOT NULL,
    numero integer,
    capacidad integer,
    localizacion text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "Hangares_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("IdHangar")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Pilotos"
(
    "IdNumeroLicencia" integer NOT NULL,
    "Restricciones" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Salario" integer,
    "Turno" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "IdAviones" integer,
    CONSTRAINT "Pilotos_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("IdNumeroLicencia")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Aviones_Pilotos"
(
    "Aviones_IdAviones" integer NOT NULL,
    "Pilotos_IdAviones" integer
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Aviones"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("IdHangar")
    REFERENCES public."Hangares" ("IdHangar") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Aviones_Pilotos"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("Aviones_IdAviones")
    REFERENCES public."Aviones" ("IdAviones") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Aviones_Pilotos"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("Pilotos_IdAviones")
    REFERENCES public."Pilotos" ("IdAviones") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
